description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Genix is an action packed twin-stick shooter and puzzle game with a twist, stripping back vanity in favour of tight addictive game play. Featuring crafted line-art graphics through a 3D perspective, wickedly sharp controls. Battle through 8 unique bosses, and 30 challenging levels with 9 weapons at your disposal.
